data.name: AccessTokenInputs
data.description: Inputs for the Get SAP S/4HANA Cloud API Access Token activity.

accessTokenOptions.description: Contains all information specific to the access token authentication flow.

url.description: The URL pointing to the SAP S/4HANA Cloud UI.
The target URL to use when providing the access token for authentication in a session. It must point to an active SAP S/4HANA Cloud API.

method.description: The method to use when providing the access token for authentication in a session. We recommend that you use HEAD.

useWinCa.description: Determines whether WIN CA certificates are sent with HTTPS requests.

accessTokenOptions.description: Contains all information specific to the access token authentication flow.

url.description: The URL pointing to the SAP S/4HANA Cloud UI.
The target URL to use when providing the access token for authentication in a session. It must point to an active SAP S/4HANA Cloud API.

method.description: The method to use when providing the access token for authentication in a session. We recommend that you use HEAD.

useWinCa.description: Determines whether WIN CA certificates are sent with HTTPS requests.

data.name: AccessTokenOutput
data.description: Output of the Get SAP S/4HANA Cloud API Access Token activity. Can contain a CSRF token.

csrfToken.description: To be added to PUT, POST and DELETE calls to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
To be added to PUT, POST and DELETE calls to SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

allowFormattingCells.description: True allows the user to format any cell on a protected worksheet.

allowFormattingColumns.description: True allows the user to format any column on a protected worksheet.

allowFormattingRows.description: True allows the user to format any row on a protected worksheet.

allowInsertingColumns.description: True allows the user to insert columns on the protected worksheet.

allowInsertingRows.description: True allows the user to insert rows on the protected worksheet.

allowFormattingCells.description: True allows the user to format any cell on a protected worksheet.

allowFormattingColumns.description: True allows the user to format any column on a protected worksheet.

allowFormattingRows.description: True allows the user to format any row on a protected worksheet.

allowInsertingColumns.description: True allows the user to insert columns on the protected worksheet.

allowInsertingRows.description: True allows the user to insert rows on the protected worksheet.

data.name: Cell
data.description: Two coordonnates corresponding to the position of a cell.

data.name: Data Object Validation
data.description: Result of the validation of a data Object. If one property of the object has a wrong type, the isValid parameter is expected to be false and the error message can be retreived.

isValid.description: The value is true if the validation is passed, false otherwise

errorMessage.description: Error message returned by the data object validator. It is undefined if there is no error.

isValid.description: The value is true if the validation is passed, false otherwise

errorMessage.description: Error message returned by the data object validator. It is undefined if there is no error.

dev.description: The numeric identifier of the device containing the file.

ino.description: The file system specific "Inode" number for the file.

mode.description: A bit-field describing the file type and mode.

nlink.description: The number of hard-links that exist for the file.

uid.description: The numeric user identifier of the user that owns the file (POSIX).

gid.description: The numeric group identifier of the group that owns the file (POSIX).

rdev.description: A numeric device identifier if the file represents a device.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

blksize.description: The file system block size for i/o operations.

blocks.description: The number of blocks allocated for this file.

atimeMs.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was accessed expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

mtimeMs.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was modified expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

ctimeMs.description: The timestamp indicating the last time the file status was changed expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

birthtimeMs.description: The timestamp indicating the creation time of this file expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

atime.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was accessed.

mtime.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was modified.

ctime.description: The timestamp indicating the last time the file status was changed.

birthtime.description: The timestamp indicating the creation time of this file.

data.name: Open Options Datatype
data.description: Options to provide opening informations and avoid some popups.

openPassword.description: Optional. Password required to open a protected workbook. If this argument is not set and the workbook requires a password, the user is prompted for the password.

writePassword.description: Optional. Password required to write to a write-protected workbook. If this argument is not set and the workbook requires a password, the user is prompted for the password.

updateLinks.description: Specifies how the file's external references (links) should be updated when the workbook is opened.

openPassword.description: Optional. Password required to open a protected workbook. If this argument is not set and the workbook requires a password, the user is prompted for the password.

writePassword.description: Optional. Password required to write to a write-protected workbook. If this argument is not set and the workbook requires a password, the user is prompted for the password.

updateLinks.description: Specifies how the file's external references (links) should be updated when the workbook is opened.

progressValue.description: Value displayed in the progress indicator area (must be number for Value-based, string for Step-based)

progressDialogTemplate.description: Progress Dialog Template. Default value: Hide

progressValue.description: Value displayed in the progress indicator area (must be number for Value-based, string for Step-based)

progressDialogTemplate.description: Progress Dialog Template. Default value: Hide

tiffCompression.description: compression for tiff, by default no compression

jpgQuality.description: encoding for jpg (from 1 to 100) (default value to 100)

tiffCompression.description: compression for tiff, by default no compression

jpgQuality.description: encoding for jpg (from 1 to 100) (default value to 100)
